description: You don't need dairy to make a killer plate of nachos! Piled high with refried beans, creamy guac, and diary-free queso, these vegan nachos will be a hit with vegans, vegetarians and omnivores alike. Watch out, because they're addictive!
name: Ultimate Vegan Nachos
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unflavored and unsweetened non-dairy milk, (divided, plus more as needed)
1 (14 ounce) can pinto beans, (drained and rinsed)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cashews and potato into a small saucepan and cover them with a few inches of water.
Place the pot over high heat and bring the water to a boil.
Lower the heat and allow it to boil for about 15 minutes, until the potato is very soft.
Remove the pot from the heat, drain the water, and allow the potato and cashews to cool for a few minutes.
Transfer the potatoes and cashews to a food processor fitted with an s-blade. Add 1/2 cup of milk and blend to form a smooth paste, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed.
Add the remaining milk, along with the nutritional yeast, hot sauce, salt, garlic powder and onion powder. Blend until smooth. Thin with additional milk if needed.
Taste-test and adjust any seasonings to your liking.
